name: Dieselbeasts
description:
A shooter/rpg inspired by space sims like Freelancer. Explore the map, shoot enemies, collect loot & visit settlements to repair & upgrade your hovercraft. Controls are simple; WASD to move & Space to shoot. Gameplay is entirely open-ended at the moment, objectives etc. may come in future updates.

This game started as a college project, but I've added to it since & have big plans for it. It's on hiatus at the moment while I try to juggle 4 other projects, but I'm putting it up on Itch to see if I can get any helpful feedback for when I do return to it.
